bio: I'm a [[results-driven|blue]] AI/ML Engineer with a strong backend foundation and deep specialization in [[NLP and LLMs|emerald]].

My expertise lies in developing [[RAG pipelines|purple]] with Haystack and LangChain, implementing [[vector search solutions|orange]] using FAISS and Qdrant, and architecting [[scalable cloud-native deployments|blue]] that solve real business challenges.
I'm passionate about creating [[production-grade AI systems|emerald]] that blend cutting-edge research with robust engineering practices to deliver measurable business impact.

With experience in [[fine-tuning transformer models|violet]] for NER and PII redaction, integrating Hugging Face Transformers and Microsoft Presidio, and evaluating LLM performance with RAGAS, I build complete ML workflows from preprocessing to monitoring.
